description: Denominator of (sum of factors of n / number of factors of n).
comments: a(n) = 1 when n is listed in A003601, a(n) > 1 when n is listed in A049642 - _Alonso del Arte_, Jan 31 2006
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(12)=3 since the 6 factors of 12 are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 12 and 1+2+3+4+6+12=28 and 28/6=14/3
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Ratio ((%), denominator)a057021 n = denominator $ a000203 n % a000005 n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 06 2012(PARI) a(n) = denominator(sigma(n)/numdiv(n)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 12 2016
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 21 2000
